# previewControllerDelegate

**Instance Property**

The preview view controller’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var previewControllerDelegate: (any RPPreviewViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Before displaying the preview view controller, your app must set a delegate in order to respond to changes in the view controller. Implement the methods described in [doc://com.apple.replaykit/documentation/ReplayKit/RPPreviewViewControllerDelegate].

## Displaying the Preview UI

- **mode**: The type of screen that appears when the view is presented.
- **RPPreviewViewControllerMode**: The modes used to determine whether the preview view controller or the share screen appears when editing a replay.
- **RPPreviewViewControllerDelegate**: The protocol you implement to respond to changes to a screen-recording user interface.
